mapper.select: SELECT C.*, M.user_name, M.user_nick FROM comments C JOIN member M ON C.user_id = M.user_id WHERE board_id=#{boardId} START WITH cmt_depth = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR cmt_id = cmt_ref ORDER SIBLINGS BY C.created_date;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (CMT_ID, USER_ID, BOARD_ID, CMT_CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, DELETED, BLOCKED, CMT_DEPTH, CMT_REF) VALUES (SEQ_COMMENTS.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{boardId}, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT);
